      • Property

        public Property(long id,
                java.lang.String legalDescription,
                java.lang.String address,
                java.lang.String quadrant,
                java.lang.String zone,
                double askingPrice,
                java.lang.String comments)
         throws InvalidLegalDescriptionException
        Constructor to initialize and assign attributes to property.
        Parameters:
        id - a long for the properties unique id.
        legalDescription - a String for the properties legal description.
        address - a String for the properties address.
        quadrant - a quadrant for the properties quadrant in the city
        zone - a String for the properties zone.
        askingPrice - a double for the properties asking price.
        comments - a String for any comments on the properties
        Throws:
        InvalidLegalDescriptionException - Legal description must be in valid format.

      • validateLegalDescription

        private void validateLegalDescription(java.lang.String desc)
                               throws InvalidLegalDescriptionException
        Method to validate the legal description. It must follow the pattern [0-9]{1,4}[A-Z][0-9]{1,4}[-][0-9]{1,2}.
        Parameters:
        desc - a String of the legal description
        Throws:
        InvalidLegalDescriptionException - thrown when legal description is not valid.
